content: Bob let me know this morning that he's going to end up having to rebuild the IG from scratch anyhow - for another reason. So he's open to changing the URL from what we had previously discussed. He can't keep sdoh-cc due to limitations of the Trifolia tool - and while he'll ask them to fix that limitation, there's no chance of them doing it in the time he needs. However, he's open to moving to sdoh-communitycare. Given our discussion, I think we'd prefer that. I need to create the Git project for him one way or the other by the end of the day. Does anyone NOT prefer sdoh-communitycore to sdoh-cc-dm?
